lead_paragraph: Calvin Johnson, one the most spectacular receivers in NFL history, retired from the Detroit Lions on Tuesday and rekindled memories of the way superstar running back Barry Sanders quietly stepped away from football.

headline.print_headline: Detroit Lions Star WR Calvin Johnson Retires After 9 Seasons
headline.main: Detroit Lions Star WR Calvin Johnson Retires After 9 Seasons

snippet: Calvin Johnson, one the most spectacular receivers in NFL history, retired from the Detroit Lions on Tuesday and rekindled memories of the way superstar running back Barry Sanders quietly stepped away from football....
